data.title: 5.tamil Literature Sangam Age To Contemporary Times
data.meta_description: 5.Tamil Literature Sangam Age to Contemporary Times - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document summarizes Tamil literature from the Sangam age to contemporary times. It discusses the major works of the Sangam age including Pathuppattu and Ettuthogai. It provides details on the authors, kings, and number of poems in each work. After the Sangam age, 18 texts were compiled as ethical and political works. It also discusses later epics like Silappathikaram and Manimekalai that provide insights into early Chola society. Overall, the document outlines the major developments and texts in Tamil literature from ancient to modern times.
